p: All diagrams were generated using GraphPad Prism 8.0 (GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA). Statistical data were analyzed by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Tukey's test using SPSS 25.0 software (IBM Corporation, Armonk, NY, USA). Results were expressed as mean ± standard deviation (SD) with significance accepted at P < 0.05.
